name: alert_correlator
description: Find all active alerts from the last 30 minutes, grouped by category. Shows alert count, affected services, and rule names to identify correlated incidents.
query: FROM .alerts-* | WHERE @timestamp > NOW() - 30 minutes AND kibana.alert.status == "active" | STATS alert_count = COUNT(*), services = VALUES(service.name), rule_names = VALUES(kibana.alert.rule.name) BY kibana.alert.rule.category | SORT alert_count DESC | LIMIT 20
